item.title: 路易斯安那州的一名校车司机被誉为英雄，因为她在一辆校车被大火吞噬之前，奋不顾身地帮助九名儿童从车上下来。
item.description:
A Louisiana school bus driver is being hailed a hero after she jumped into action and helped nine children off a school bus before the vehicle was engulfed in flames. https://t.co/U4esBR6c2G

— ABC News (@ABC) March 21, 2024

item.title: 前尼克儿童频道制片人丹-施耐德（Dan Schneider）正在回应针对他的指控，这些指控在专题片《片场静悄悄》（Quiet on Set）中有所提及：儿童电视的黑暗面
item.description:

item.title: 据警方称，两名十几岁的男孩因涉嫌谋杀一名 21 岁男子而受到指控，该男子的尸体在犹他州的一个偏远沙漠地区被发现。
item.description:
Two teenage boys have been charged in connection with the murder of a 21-year-old man whose body was found in a remote desert area in Utah, according to police.

The victim was last seen alive getting into a white Jeep Liberty on Sunday, authorities say. https://t.co/yXjxAjv9rn pic.twitter.com/5j95zsFwpG

— ABC News (@ABC) March 21, 2024

item.title: 美国国务院表示，美国已将30多名受困美国人空运出海地首都，这是在帮派领导的叛乱中进行的最新一次撤离行动。
item.description:
The U.S. has airlifted more than 30 stranded Americans out of Haiti's capital in the latest evacuation amid gang-led rebellion, the State Department said. https://t.co/YEYcID81ny

— ABC News (@ABC) March 21, 2024

item.title: 亚利桑那州共和党参议员候选人卡里-莱克（Kari Lake）正在准备与民主党众议员鲁本-加列戈（Ruben Gallego）展开一场可能的竞争，并为此倚重前总统特朗普的 "美国优先 "政策。
item.description:

item.title: 但研究人员说，当我们了解这种疾病的病因或治疗方法时，我们仍然是 "隔靴搔痒"：
item.description:
Millions of Americans are still experiencing long COVID more than four years since the pandemic.

But researchers say we are still "scratching the surface" when it comes to our understanding of what causes the condition or how to treat it.

Read more at: https://t.co/BcNAZqzWSl pic.twitter.com/iaWfRv1xvd

— ABC News (@ABC) March 21, 2024

item.title: 一名华盛顿州男子被指控帮助杀害数千只鸟，他于周三在联邦法院认罪，承认在蒙大拿州的一个美洲印第安人保留地射杀老鹰，并在黑市上出售其羽毛和身体部位。
item.description:
A Washington state man accused of helping kill thousands of birds pleaded guilty in federal court on Wednesday to shooting eagles on an American Indian reservation in Montana and selling their feathers and body parts on the black market. https://t.co/5I4lHZM1zf pic.twitter.com/4GNqU4IPjq

— ABC News (@ABC) March 21, 2024

item.title: 一艘西班牙大帆船在哥伦比亚水域沉没数百年后--也就是在最初发现这艘船的近十年后--官员们说，这艘沉船上估计有价值 170 亿美元的宝藏，最快将于四月被打捞上来。
item.description:
Centuries after a Spanish galleon ship sunk in Colombian waters — and nearly a decade after it was initially discovered — the shipwreck, with an estimated $17 billion worth of treasure on board, is set to be recovered as soon as April, officials said. https://t.co/L8kjUalhCE pic.twitter.com/A8QWhR13QV

— ABC News (@ABC) March 20, 2024

item.title: 在纽约，一条与主人共同生活了三十多年的鳄鱼被保护人员扣押--现在，鳄鱼的主人正在为它的归来而斗争。

item.title: 寻找失踪大学生莱利.斯特恩（Riley Strain）的行动已经进行了十多天，他的家人说他们已经开始进行艰难的对话。

item.title: 海平面的不断上升让国家公园管理局别无选择，只能砍伐 150 多棵华盛顿特区的标志性樱花树，这些樱花树一个多世纪以来一直矗立在海滨景观带上。
item.description:
Rising sea levels are leaving the National Park Service no choice but to cut down more than 150 of Washington, D.C.'s iconic cherry trees that have lined the waterfront view for more than a century. https://t.co/YDl6sgNkdu

— ABC News (@ABC) March 20, 2024

item.title: 密苏里州最高法院拒绝停止对布莱恩-多西（Brian Dorsey）执行死刑，他因18年前杀害其表妹及其丈夫而定于下月被处死。

item.title: 根据《2024 年世界幸福报告》，美国的排名下降了 8 位，不再是世界前 20 个最幸福的国家，落后于加拿大、以色列、科威特、立陶宛和阿拉伯联合酋长国等国。
item.description:
The United States has fallen eight spots and is no longer in the top 20 happiest countries in the world, falling behind countries like Canada, Israel, Kuwait, Lithuania and the United Arab Emirates, according to the 2024 World Happiness Report.https://t.co/t3X37B6hdK pic.twitter.com/tAr5JnL1i9

— ABC News (@ABC) March 20, 2024

item.title: 科学家已经追踪到一颗小行星，其大小相当于纽约帝国大厦，预计将于 2182 年与地球擦肩而过。

item.title: 周三，宾夕法尼亚州发生了一场毁灭性的房屋火灾，四名幼儿和一名成人丧生：
item.description:
Four young children and one adult were killed in a devastating house fire in Pennsylvania on Wednesday, officials said.

The youngest victim was a 1-month-old girl.

Read more: https://t.co/Jm22MfhXu9 pic.twitter.com/VeWec3WllK

item.title: 气候变化使花粉季节开始得更早，持续时间更长，专家说，这可能会影响数百万患有过敏症的美国人。
item.description:

item.title: 纽约州总检察长莱蒂西亚-詹姆斯（Letitia James）对唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）提出的暂缓执行其 4.64 亿美元民事欺诈判决的 "非同寻常 "请求进行了回击，认为这位前总统最近提出的请求不可靠、程序不当，而且是基于一个有缺陷的前提。
item.description:
New York AG Letitia James is pushing back on Donald Trump's "extraordinary" request for a stay of his $464 million civil fraud judgment, arguing the former president's recent request was unreliable, procedurally improper and based on a flawed premise. https://t.co/AlS28jKUGC pic.twitter.com/xdQVr571AB

— ABC News (@ABC) March 20, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：据美国司法部称，前密西西比州治安官克里斯蒂安-戴德蒙（Christian Dedmon）因参与两起袭击事件，包括折磨两名黑人男子，被判处 40 年监禁。
item.description:

— ABC News (@ABC) March 20, 2024

item.title: 消防员告诉记者，在宾夕法尼亚州周三发生的一场毁灭性房屋火灾中，四名幼儿和一名成人丧生。
item.description:
Four young children and one adult were killed in a devastating house fire in Pennsylvania on Wednesday, officials said.

Three people — an adult and two children — were rescued, firefighters told reporters. https://t.co/dripeMB5oH

— ABC News (@ABC) March 20, 2024
